card_text_a: We offer delivery services to business in the retail and e-commerce sectors. Explore fast and reliable ship-from-store deliveries to all your clients. You log an order, we match and dispatch a rider.
card_text_b: We are available to deliver your goods and run your last-minute errands. Need to get items urgently from your home or elsewhere? All you have to do is log your request and a rider will be available to deliver.
card_text_c: We are equipped to meet your varied demands and needs; ranging from delivery of fragile goods to bulk orders. Your company receives an order for goods located at two different stores, TexKoop will deploy riders to various locations to fulfill daunting deliveries in no time.
card_text_d: Need some extra cash? becoming a rider with TexKoop is an amazing plan to start earning and with our readily available bike rental services you can get started right away!
